Module FlightsFX
Package flightsfx.model

Class Flight

  • java.lang.Object
    • flightsfx.model.Flight
  • public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object

    Flight

    Class to define flights with their flight number, destination, departure and duration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Flight​(java.lang.String flightNumber)
      Performs the initialization to the flight number.
      Flight​(java.lang.String flightNumber, java.lang.String destination, java.time.LocalDateTime departure, java.time.LocalTime duration)
      Performs the complete initialization to the flight in order to save and load them.
